verses.name: Psalms 92:1
verses.text: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the Lord, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High:

verses.name: Psalms 92:2
verses.text: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,

verses.name: Psalms 92:3
verses.text: Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.

verses.name: Psalms 92:4
verses.text: For thou, Lord, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.

verses.name: Psalms 92:5
verses.text: O Lord, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.

verses.name: Psalms 92:6
verses.text: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
